Module App_utils

Package App_utils.math

package App_utils.math
Provides shorthands to certain mathematics tasks.
  • Class
    Description
    InvertedMinAndMaxBoundException
    Exception when a function requires a Max and Min int bounds, but receives a min value that is actually bigger than the max boundary.
    Random
    Provides methods to do action based on random values.
